metadata.title: CVE-2019-16892 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Rubyzip before 1.3.0, a crafted ZIP file can bypass application checks on ZIP entry sizes because data about the uncompressed size can be spoofed. This allows attackers to cause a denial of service (disk consumption).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-16892` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-zip - 2.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-zip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-2').
